thread.title: Lead lawyer quits Trump's Russia team

title: Lead lawyer quits Trump's Russia team
text:
Lead lawyer quits Trump's Russia team Thursday, March 22, 2018 - 01:30 
Attorney John Dowd has stepped down from Trump's legal team after disagreeing with the President on how to respond to the Russia investigation. The shakeup comes as House Democrats warn Trump not to fire special counsel Robert Mueller.   
Attorney John Dowd has stepped down from Trump's legal team after disagreeing with the President on how to respond to the Russia investigation. The shakeup comes as House Democrats warn Trump not to fire special counsel Robert Mueller.  //reut.rs/2pxr8sY
